en: Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig have a new picture of Peppa and George.
zh: 猪妈妈和猪爸爸新拍了一张佩奇和乔治的照片。

en: We should put this lovely, new picture on the wall.
zh: 我们该把这张可爱的照片挂在墙上。

en: I am the DIY expert of the house.
zh: 我是这个家里动手能力最强的。

en: Are you sure you can do it?
Of course! I'll just put a nail in the wall and hang the picture on it.
zh: 当然可以！我会在墙上钉个钉子然后把照片挂上去。

en: I'm just off to visit Granny and Grandpa Pig.
zh: 那我就出发去看猪奶奶和猪爷爷了。

en: And please, don't make a mess.
Daddy, can we help put up the picture?
zh: 爸爸，我们可以帮你挂照片吗？

en: You can watch and then you'll learn how to do it properly.
zh: 你们看着然后你们就学会怎么做了。

en: First, I need a tape measure.
That is where I'm going to put the nail.
zh: 这就是我要钉钉子的地方。

en: Now I need a hammer and a nail.
zh: 现在，我需要一把锤子和一个钉子。

en: Stand back, children, and watch a craftsman at work.
zh: 往后站，孩子们，看看工匠工作。

en: Daddy Pig is going to knock the nail into the wall.
zh: 猪爸爸要把钉子钉进墙里。

en: Oh, it's not meant to do that.
Daddy Pig has made a big crack in the wall.
zh: 猪爸爸把墙弄了一条大的裂缝。

en: Oh, Daddy! You've broken the wall.
zh: 哦，爸爸！你把墙给弄坏了。

en: I can still see the crack, Daddy.
zh: 我还是可以看到裂缝，爸爸。

en: Yes, I'll just take the nail out and fill in the crack.
zh: 是呀，那我把钉子拿出来把裂缝填上。

en: Now you really have broken the wall.
zh: 现在，你真的把墙弄坏了。

en: Do you think Mummy will notice?
zh: 你觉得妈妈会注意到吗？

en: Er... Yes, I think she might.
zh: 呃...是的，我想她会注意到的。

en: Daddy Pig has to mend the wall before Mummy Pig comes home.
zh: 猪爸爸必须在猪妈妈回来前将墙修好。

en: First, Daddy Pig fills the hole with bricks.
zh: 首先，猪爸爸要先用砖填好墙洞。

en: Next, Daddy Pig puts plaster over the bricks.
zh: 接着，猪爸爸将水泥糊在砖上。

en: Then Daddy Pig paints the wall.
zh: 然后，猪爸爸把墙粉刷好。

en: But look at all the mess they have made.
zh: 但是看看家里都乱成了什么样呀。

en: We had better clean up before Mummy comes back.
zh: 我们得在猪妈妈回来前打扫干净。

en: First, Daddy Pig quickly washes Peppa and George.
zh: 首先，猪爸爸快速地将佩奇和乔治清洗干净。
然后佩奇用吸尘器清洁了地板。

en: And Daddy Pig tidies up the tools.

zh: 快！假装什么事都没有发生。

en: Yes. I can see you've been doing nothing.
zh: 是的。我能看出来你什么都没有做。

en: I thought you were going to put the picture up.
zh: 我还以为你会把照片挂起来。

en: In all the excitement, Daddy Pig has forgotten to put the picture up.
zh: 忙了半天，猪爸爸忘了把照片挂起来。

en: Well, I'm no expert, but I'm sure it's quite easy.
zh: 好吧，我虽然不是专家，但是我相信应该挺简单的。

en: Hmmm... yes, that did look quite easy.
zh: 嗯。。。是的，看上去确实很容易。

en: But when you did it, Daddy,it looked really hard.
zh: 但爸爸你这样做的时候，看上去很难。
